attributes.review: My eyes are scarred from this disgusting cheeto cheese ball. I am allergic to cheetos so right as i opened the app i sneezed on my phone causing snot to shoot on my phone. when i wipes it off, there was another picture of a cheeto which caused me to pass out. i was lucky my parents were there but she grabbed my phone to call 911 and saw the picture. she is also allergic which caused her to pass out aswell. the same thing happened with my dad and i am currently hiding with my dog in the closet typing this on a croissant. please. send. help.
attributes.title: disgusting 😤

attributes.review: If I could give this app 0 stars I would. Insanely slow and super glitchy all of the time! As soon as I downloaded this my phone started freezing and glitching out and it won’t let me delete it! This must be some kind of fake app that the crazy dems created to hack working Americans phones😡 needs to be taken off of the App Store immediately before this virus hurts anyone else. I had to take my phone to the T-Mobile store to get completely erased and fixed and the employees said DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!
attributes.title: AWFUL!

attributes.review:
I opened this app to see this life sized Cheeto making America look disgusting. I cannot believe the App Store allowed such a conniving and heartless person be able to use their platform. I strongly do not recommend anything involving this man or application to anyone. Just a reminder if you support this man it’s not about being a republican or Democrat it’s about who you are at this point. This man is nothing but racist, misogynistic, and homophobic... the fact that you support him makes you all three just like him. 
🚫🚯ENTER AT YOUR OWN RISK. 🚫🚯
attributes.title: RACIST, RAUNCHY, & REPULSIVE!

attributes.review: I was walking to the store with my pet iguana named Tommy. Tommy looks 👀 at me and says” the angry Cheeto man 👨 has spoken.” I looked up at the sky and saw the Cheeto man 👨 walking through the clouds naked. I ran to the store and got some milk 🥛 for my dog 🐶 to eat. I left the store and the Cheeto man 👨 was gone. Yes!  I run 🏃‍♀️ home 🏠 with my milk 🥛 for my dog 🐶. I open the door 🚪 and the angry 😡 Cheeto man 👨 is staring at me. He says he wants the milk 🥛 and takes it from my hands  I cried and went to my room. Tommy the iguana 🦎 followed me and cried with me. My dog 🐶 Paul bit the angry 😡 Cheeto man 👨 and he died. But DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP ITS BADDDD!
attributes.title: TËRRÏBŁË ÄPP

attributes.review: My phone doesn’t work anymore after using this, and I already tried microwaving it because that’s what the phone store told me to do. But it was burnt when I took it out of the microwave so I put it in the fridge and 15 minutes later it was bright orange when I took it out. I went to bed planning on buying a new phone the next day and when I woke up my fridge and microwave were orange. So don’t download this app your things will start to become orange - 𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑚𝑒𝑠𝑠𝑎𝑔𝑒 𝑤𝑎𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝𝑟𝑜𝑣𝑒𝑑 𝑏𝑦 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝐻𝑜𝑡 𝐶ℎ𝑒𝑒𝑡𝑜 𝑀𝑎𝑛

I tried to refresh the app and it was the same thing ,when I opened the app it asked for a number but I did not want to do that cuz it was unnecessary like the word that come out of the 🍊 Cheeto looking, racist president that we see. But I tried not to look at anyone like that as he has done some stuff for us...I guess, this app was not as helpful as I thought it would be. But Trump 2020 all the way❤️❤️🥰 in JAIL😘✨✨

First of all it took for EVER to download, and when it finally did and I opened the app my phone started to glitch and turned off. 👀 after a few minutes I restarted it hoping I could open the app, and every time I want to open the it my phone turns off! 😩 Pls take this app off the Apple store! It’s TRASH 😤

attributes.review: I downloaded the app and it took so long to download. Once it had downloaded onto my phone Trump nearly started World War III, fires spread across Australia, the Coronavirus erupted and spread, Murder Hornets were a thing, there were UFOs and there is still more to come. I think this is a sign to stop people supporting Trump. Or this is something like gods flood, except a virus kills all of Trump elderly supporters so people who will live for more than 4 years can change the world for the better instead of electing a president who is supported by Nazis.

attributes.review: This app is super glitch and took like 5 minutes to download🙄. When I opened the app it kicked me out of the app like 10 times then I asked my parents if they could fix it and they didn’t so I fixed myself but then when I opened it, it didn’t kick me out but it popped up a whole bunch of ads about trump like what the heck just let me open the app but I deleted it after that because it wasn’t letting me into the app. And for all you Karen’s reading this go get a life.
